title: Course codes of all the UG courses in the college
content:
Can anyone give all the course codes used in SRNs of students from all the branches in UG? A list is preferred.. 
Thank you

For more clarity
PES2UG22(CS)000

Here, CS is for Computer Science Engineering.... like that there will be some code for all the branches in both the campuses.... I need them as a list

comments.body: Looks like OP is trying to scrape PESU Academy's "Know your Class and Section" page lol
Bro i tried doing that. There's some error called "element not interactable". If you know the fix, DM!!!

What are you trying to scrape details for? Regardless, you can simply replicate the request being made at PESU Academy's end. You are *probably* trying to use selenium, which isn't needed. You can find more details on how to go about this from `pesuacademy-py` library that HSP built [here](https://github.com/HackerSpace-PESU/pesuacademy-py/blob/d37f5afd6ea34456e2bdbbed82c040c159f8005b/pesuacademy/pesuacademy.py#L88-L123).

Alternatively, you can also use the library directly and fetch details.

`pip install pesuacademy`

```python
from pesuacademy import PESUAcademy

p = PESUAcademy()
profile = p.know_your_class_and_section(PRN)
```

I'd suggest using the library. You can refer to the [GitHub repo](https://github.com/HackerSpace-PESU/pesuacademy-py) for more documentation.
Thank you!!! Will look through it, and yeah I tried using selenium which gave this error
This also works!!!! Thank you so much!!!!
